project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Amplify Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/contracts

findings.title: For Loop Over Dynamic Array
findings.description: Potential issue with iterating over dynamic arrays using for loops.

findings.title: D.2 Missing address verification
findings.description: The functions whitelistLender, blacklistBorrower, and blacklistLender do not verify the addresses passed as parameters.

findings.title: A.2 Floating Pragma
findings.description: The contract makes use of the floating-point pragma 0.8.0. Contracts should be deployed using the same compiler version and flags that were used during the testing process.

findings.title: A.1 Missing value verification
findings.description: Certain functions lack a safety check in the value, the values that are coming from the arguments should be verified, otherwise, the contract's functionality might get hurt.

findings.title: For Loop Over Dynamic Array
findings.description: has a loop with array that can grow without bound that can be costly;

findings.title: F.2 Floating Pragma
findings.description: The contract makes use of the floating-point pragma 0.8.0. Contracts should be deployed using the same compiler version and flags that were used during the testing process.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: The contract makes use of the floating-point pragma 0.8.0. Contracts should be deployed using the same compiler version and flags that were used during the testing process.
